    Estimate cell composition across spatial samples using information from a custom cell signature matrix

    spatialDeconvolution.Rd

    Estimate cell composition across spatial samples using information from a custom cell signature matrix

    spatialDeconvolution(
  dsp.obj,
  norm.expr.type = "",
  ref.mtx,
  ref.annot,
  cell.id = "CellID",
  celltype.col = "LabeledCellType",
  normalize = FALSE,
  min.cell.num = 0,
  min.genes = 10
)

    Arguments

    dsp.obj

    Nanostring object containing normalized gene expression data

    norm.expr.type

    Name of the slot containing normalized gene expression data

    ref.mtx

    expression matrix (Gene x Reference_Samples)

    ref.annot

    annotated data.frame with cell.id and LabeledCellType, will be used along with ref.mtx to generate custom signature matrix

    cell.id

    column of annotated data.frame containing cell barcode or name

    celltype.col

    column of annotated data.frame containing cell identity information

    normalize

    scale profile matrix gene expression according to gene count

    min.cell.num

    minimum number of cells (within a type) required to generate signature matrix

    min.genes

    filters cells according to minimum number of genes expressed

    Value

    A list res containing the results of spatial deconvolution, res$beta: matrix of estimated cell abundances res$X: cell signature (gene x celltype) matrix used to generate deconvolution results res$yhat, res$resids: fitted values and log2-scale residuals from deconvolution, can be used to measure observations' goodness of fit res$prop_of_all: res$beta rescaled to proportion of celltype across each sample heatmap / barplot of estimated cell abundances in data

    Contents

    Developed by First Last.
